projects.title: Polimap — Geo-analytics
projects.description: Built a spatial analytics platform for local area teams. ETL pipeline in Python/SQL with PostGIS spatial joins and FastAPI backend. Heatmaps render ~10k points in ~3s with reliable spatial metrics.

projects.title: PowerCo — Churn Prediction
projects.description: Reduced customer churn by identifying high-risk customers. Used XGBoost with calibrated thresholds achieving recall ≈0.97 @0.30 threshold with clear stakeholder guidance.

projects.title: Citi — FP&A Pack
projects.description: Built KPI/variance packs for month-end reporting linked to Basel III metrics. Standardized price/mix/volume drivers with templated exec summaries, reducing rework cycles.

projects.title: Cognizant — Gala ML
projects.description: Built ML pipeline to predict stock availability at Gala warehouses. Used regression models with feature engineering to optimize inventory management and reduce stockouts.

projects.title: KPMG — Sales-CLV
projects.description: Customer segmentation and lifetime value analysis for retail. Built RFM models and predictive CLV models to guide marketing strategy and customer targeting.

projects.title: Tata — BI Sprint
projects.description: Built executive dashboards and KPI metrics for retail operations. Created interactive Tableau dashboards with SQL data pipelines for real-time business insights.
